subject: Officiating (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Revisions to the N.H.L.’s Rule 48, which applies to hits to the head, gives referees two options: a two-minute minor or a rare match penalty.
snippet: Revisions to the N.H.L.’s Rule 48, which applies to hits to the head, gives referees two options: a two-minute minor or a rare match penalty.
